sources.title: Where There's a Will
sources.description: Will Hay plays Benjamin Stubbins a penniless seedy solicitor cum jack of all trades who happens to have rich relations in the country, and a cluttered office in the City directly above a bank. Unfortunately he makes the acquaintance of a gang of acquisitive gun-toting thieves who think he's a useful contact to have in the furtherance of their aims.

sources.title: Where There's A Will (1936)
sources.description: A solicitor becomes party to a bank robbery. PD In UK At GATT Date. Not Eligible For GATT Never registered in the U.S. Mystic Nights Videos

metadata.Plot: An incompetent solicitor unwittingly becomes party to a bank robbery.
metadata.Writer: Leslie Arliss, Sidney Gilliat, Will Hay
metadata.Actors: Will Hay, Graham Moffatt, H.F. Maltby
